data.title: Meet the new Nuggets: Keita Bates-Diop, Gerald Green, Shabazz Napier and Noah Vonleh added in four-team trade
data.meta_description: The Nuggets roster underwent an overnight makeover late Tuesday in a blockbuster four-team trade that will reportedly bring four players to the Mile High City.
data.text:
The Nuggets roster underwent an overnight makeover in a blockbuster four-team trade that brought four players to the Mile High City.

However, don’t order those new jerseys just yet. Denver’s aggressive approach might not be over with seemingly fluid roster construction until Thursday’s trade deadline.

But Malik Beasley, Juancho Hernangomez and Jarred Vanderbilt were dealt late Tuesday to the Minnesota Timberwolves, and in return, the Nuggets received a 2020 first-round draft choice and the following four players.

Keita Bates-Diop (6-8, 229), SF, Timberwolves

A 2018 second-round NBA draft pick who came off the bench this season recording 6 points and 2.9 rebounds. … 2018 Big Ten Player of the Year as a senior at Ohio State. … A rangy defender who scored in double-figures 12 times this season (career-high 22 in November at the Suns). … Current contract: Three years/$3.9 million (RFA in 2021).

Gerald Green (6-6, 205), SF/SG, Rockets

Was expected to be waived soon by the Rockets. … A 12th-year NBA pro who suffered a season-ending foot injury in the preseason. … Averaged 10.2 points and 20.9 minutes off the bench for Houston over the past two years. … Current contract: One year/$2.5 million (UFA in 2020).

Shabazz Napier (6-0, 175), PG, Timberwolves

A 2014 first-round NBA draft pick who has played for five different teams. … Averaged 9.6 points, 5.2 assists, and 3.1 rebounds off the bench this season. … Led UConn to the 2014 national championship and voted the NCAA Tournament’s most outstanding player. … Current contract: Two years/$3.7 million (UFA in 2020).

Noah Vonleh (6-10, 257), PF/C, Timberwolves

Another 2014 first-round NBA draft pick who has played for five different teams. … Averaged 4.1 points and 4 rebounds off the bench this season. … Named Big Ten freshman of the year in his lone season at Indiana (2014). … Current contract: One year/$2 million (UFA in 2020).

* Contract information provided by spotrac.com.

Subscribe to our Nuggets Insider newsletter to get the latest team news sent straight to your inbox.
